org.altbeacon.beacon

Class AltBeacon.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.altbeacon.beacon.Beacon.Builder
      • org.altbeacon.beacon.AltBeacon.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AltBeacon

    public static class AltBeacon.Builder
extends Beacon.Builder
    Builder class for AltBeacon objects. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a Beacon

    Example: 

     Beacon beacon = new Beacon.Builder()
         .setId1("2F234454-CF6D-4A0F-ADF2-F4911BA9FFA6")
         .setId2("1")
         .setId3("2")
         .setMfgReserved(3);
         .build();
